description:
Mobile & Modular Flow-through / Underway System for precise pCO2 measurements

	High accuracy due to automatic temperature and pressure compensation
	Robust, versatile and compact housing for ship + offshore applications
	Complete, hand carry able and easy to maintain “Underway” or “Lab” System
	Includes the well-known LI-COR  pCO2 sensor
	High stability with auto calibration feature included standard offset zeroing , auto- or manually span gas calibration supported – low maintenance costs
	“FerryBox” concept: easy integration of instrumentation through integrated “SmartDI” data management system, connected simultaneously by up to 36 serial interfaces (AADI Aanderaa Optode, BBE Algae Monitor, SBE Seabird CTD’s and Thermosalinographs, Sea&Sun CTD’s, SYSTEA Nutrient Analysers, TriOS algae monitor, Turner Fluorometer, Seapoint; WetLabs Fluorometer etc.)
	Optionally expandable through the RS-485 bus, e.g. to connect a Meteorology or sea- and waste water pumps. A full water supply is supported.
	Optionally automatic cleaning procedure includes flagging of collected data 
	Automatic report for interferences and initiation of diagnostic routines
	Optionally GPS geo references for all data and position event control
	Optionally online telemetry data transfer and alarm services
	Easy handling and intuitive overall design
